      • setPowerup

        public void setPowerup(com.orbischallenge.tron.protocol.TronProtocol.PowerUpType powType)
        Parameters:
        powType - Give the player a powerup
        If you are reading this, you probably are wondering if you can change whether or not a light cycle has a powerup and what that powerup is. You can, after all, this method is public. BUT - the lightCycle you would be modifying only exists on the client that instantiated your playerAI class. Furthermore, the lightCycle objects are created for each turn and do not persist nor are they returned to the server which determines the game outcome. Only your turn is passed to the server.

      • isInvincible

        Returns:
        boolean Whether or not the player is invincible
